## Ocean

The ocean (also the sea or the world ocean) is the body of salt water that covers approximately 70.8% of the Earth and contains 97% of Earth's water.\[1\] To learn more about the oceans see <https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ocean>.

## Aquatic Animals

## Code

When you click the **Render** button a presentation will be generated that includes both content and the output of embedded code. You can embed code like this:

```{r}

```
